sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, cast_info ci
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.production_year  <  2007 AND mc.company_id  <  72980 AND mc.company_type_id  <  2 AND ci.person_id  <  3508626

 BitmapScan(t)
 Leading((mc (ci t))) */
